nodes.text: Eopie Cream Pie was a dessert pie, considered to be delicious.
Bren Kingal gave a spacer an eopie cream pie as a gift for killing Throne Thanamiroc, a supposed murderer and master of disguise.
The recipe for this dessert was kept as a closely guarded secret by the Kingal family.

Eopie cream pie appeared in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. In the game, eopie cream pie was awarded by Bren Kingal for completing his final quest, which involved killing an individual named Throne Thanamiroc outside of Mos Taike. It should be noted that the same graphical model for eopie cream pie was used for other items in the game.

Because the recipe was a closely guarded secret, it is not known what ingredients made up the pie, or how it was made. However, its name suggests that the pie may have contained eopie cream. Whether or not eopie cream was made up of eopie milk or its meat is unknown.
